Server.remotePlayer

  • Packages that use remotePlayer 
    Package Description
    Game.Core
    The core functionality of the game.
    Network
    Contains the network functionality.
    Server
    Contains the server functionality, what connects the game with the network.
    Tests
    Tests for requirements.
